all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Behold, verily I say unto you, the angels are crying unto the Lord day and night, who are ready and waiting to be sent forth to reap down the fields;
Doctrine and Covenants 86:5
Quote of the Day
"As part of the prophesied restoration of all things in the latter days, ancient prophets and apostles personally conferred priesthood authority upon Joseph Smith."
Elder David A. Bednar | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
